text: Joseph Hillis Miller Jr. (March 5, 1928 â€“ February 7, 2021) was an American literary critic and scholar. He worked with Johns Hopkins University, Yale University, and University of California, Irvine, and wrote over 50 books about American and British literature. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Yale University faculty Category:American literary critics Category:People from Newport News, Virginia Category:Writers from Virginia Category:University of California faculty Category:Johns Hopkins University faculty
